data: 1. Use clean language! - We do not tolerate any bullying, foul, or graphic language. 2. Play Nice! - Use good manners towards your fellow Fairies and you will have a great time. 3. Privacy Please! - Never reveal any personal information. The best way to stay safe online is to NEVER share your real name, phone number, address, e-mail, Account ID, or password. 4. Cheaters never prosper - and using a cheat program will get you banned.
